command: tsx scripts/codex-app-mention-smoke.ts --app Figma --prompt "If this host supports embedded inline app UI, render it now. Otherwise explain what you can do via tools only."

evidence.agentFinalText:
This host does not support embedded inline app UI rendering in-chat, so I canâ€™t render a live inline Figma app pane here.

Via tools, I can still do quite a lot for you:

- Read Figma nodes and return design context/code (`get_design_context`)
- Pull structure/metadata/screenshots/variables (`get_metadata`, `get_screenshot`, `get_variable_defs`)
- Generate FigJam diagrams and share editable links (`generate_diagram`)
- Generate marketing assets or slide decks with Figma tools (`figma_generate_asset`, `figma_generate_deck`)
- Map Figma nodes to code components with Code Connect tools
- Capture webpages into Figma files (`generate_figma_design`)

If you share a Figma URL/node ID, I can run one of these now.
